name: Forest Shootout
description:
Gameplay:
Create or Connect to a server then play. It supports 16 players max.
The game uses port 7777 for the server.
Weapon pickups are scattered around the map a if you run out of ammo.

Controls:
W,A,S,D - Move
Left mouse - Shoot
Right mouse - Use scope on sniper
Space - Jump
Shift - Run
TAB - Scoreboard
C - Crouch
E - Respawn
T - Text message
K - Suicide

Sources:Player model used from GTA:SATextures used from: textures.com

Minimum system requirements:
- Windows XP SP2 or newer
- .Net Framework 2.0
- 512 MB RAM
- 2.0 Ghz CPU
- Nvidia 9500 GT
- 80 MB free space
- 50 MB after instal
